Package mg.emberframework.core.handler

Class RedirectionHandler

java.lang.Object
mg.emberframework.core.handler.RedirectionHandler
public class RedirectionHandler extends Object
Handles redirection and forwarding of requests in the Ember Framework.

This utility class processes ModelView objects to either redirect to a URL or forward the request with data attributes to a view.

Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Sandratra NIAINA

  • Method Details

    • redirect

      public static void redirect(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, ModelView modelView) throws jakarta.servlet.ServletException, IOException
      Redirects or forwards the request based on the ModelView.
      Parameters:
      request - the HTTP request
      response - the HTTP response
      modelView - the model view containing the URL and data
      Throws:
      jakarta.servlet.ServletException - if a servlet error occurs during forwarding
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during redirection
